Module stincmale.server
Package stincmale.server

Class ExternallyVisibleException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
stincmale.server.ExternallyVisibleException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ExternallyVisibleException
extends RuntimeException
This RuntimeException is intended to provide a error message that may be made visible outside the application.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • ExternallyVisibleException

      public ExternallyVisibleException​(String externalMessage)
      Parameters:
      externalMessage - Message that may be made visible outside the application.

    • ExternallyVisibleException

      public ExternallyVisibleException​(@Nullable String message, String externalMessage)
      Parameters:
      message - The detail message which is saved for later retrieval by the Throwable.getMessage() method.
      externalMessage - Message that may be made visible outside the application.

    • ExternallyVisibleException

      public ExternallyVisibleException​(@Nullable String message, @Nullable Throwable cause, String externalMessage)
      Parameters:
      message - The detail message which is saved for later retrieval by the Throwable.getMessage() method.
      cause - The cause which is saved for later retrieval by the Throwable.getCause() method.
      externalMessage - Message that may be made visible outside the application.

    • ExternallyVisibleException

      public ExternallyVisibleException​(String externalMessage, @Nullable Throwable cause)
      Parameters:
      externalMessage - Message that may be made visible outside the application.
      cause - The cause which is saved for later retrieval by the Throwable.getCause() method.
